description: Central Province - The Order made under Sections 277(1)(i), 277(1B) (b) of the amended Municipal Council Ordinance (Chapter 252) to be read with Sec. 2 of the Provincial Council (Consequential Provisions) Act, No. 12 of 1989, remove Mr. D. N. Aluvihare, Mayor of the Municipal Council Matale from Office with effect from 02.12.2020
